body:
So I was I Spanish, and we had to make a family tree with the Spanish names of the people, age, and draw it out. Well, I decided to draw my dog, Max. My teacher ended asking me why I had a pet lizard. ._.

...

http://imgur.com/O9TfzaM End result

Anyone have any art they'd like to share that can top that? (Bet you can't)

title: Art? (Work of a master)

Awww Tu perrito Máximo es taaan tierno ♥

Mi dibujo está en Español también!
